channel.title: Arg! Major problem with my server!
channel.description:
help guys!! Ive nearlly finished creating my server, well the basic stuff! Next i will be starting to add custom items etc...
Well ive hit a rock... A big rock!!
When i strat my server up it does it fine, i load my runescape 317 deob (downloaded from here) it runs fine, when i click the logon button (as a local host) it loads up, but then stays on a black screen and freezes! It says this in the client cmd [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.land.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14512 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:270) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270) at Client.method105(client.java:8031) at Client.method36(client.java:1600) at Client.method102(client.java:7754) at Client.method9(client.java:8607) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:124) at client.run(client.java:4442) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Please help me!!! Regards ~Johno

item.title: Arg! Major problem with my server!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

No errors from my compiler, but this is my run.bat for the client

@echo off TITLE RuneScape java -Xmx500m client pause

Read full topic
item.source: Arg! Major problem with my server!

item.title: Arg! Major problem with my server!
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Try getting a new client, or try compiling. If you get compiling errors for the client, post them.

Read full topic

@johno2 wrote:

@airborne wrote:

I’m pretty sure you have problems in the client class, class8 class, and applet_sup1 class. If you added anything there, please post it.

item.title: Arg! Major problem with my server!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

help guys!! Ive nearlly finished creating my server, well the basic stuff! Next i will be starting to add custom items etc…

Well ive hit a rock… A big rock!!

When i strat my server up it does it fine, i load my runescape 317 deob (downloaded from here) it runs fine, when i click the logon button (as a local host) it loads up, but then stays on a black screen and freezes!
It says this in the client cmd

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.land.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14512 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:270) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270) at Client.method105(client.java:8031) at Client.method36(client.java:1600) at Client.method102(client.java:7754) at Client.method9(client.java:8607) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:124) at client.run(client.java:4442) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Please help me!!!
Regards
~Johno
